author: Baha'u'llah
source_text: اگرچه بحمد الله حقّ و مظاهر او همیشه در علوّ ارتفاع و سموّ امتناع خود بوده بلکه علوّ و سموّ بقول او خلق شده لو انتم ببصر هذا الغلام تنظرون
translation: It should, however, be borne in mind that God and His Manifestation can, under no circumstances, be dissociated from the loftiness and sublimity which They inherently possess. Nay, loftiness and sublimity are themselves the creations of His Word, if ye choose to see with My sight not with yours.
